Class TicketManager

Object
TicketManager
public class TicketManager extends Object
manager class to handle ticket actions

  • Field Details

    • instance

      public static TicketManager instance
      instance checks whether TicketManager has been instantiated before. Static variable is the same between objects of the same class.

    • FILE

      public static final String FILE
      The file name of the database file that this manager will access

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TicketManager getInstance()
      getInstance checks if TicketManager has been instantiated before. If no previous instance was created, it creates a new one, else it will use the original instance.

    • read

      public ArrayList<Ticket> read()

    • createTicket

      public void createTicket(String ticketType, String movieType)
      Method to create a new ticket type
      Parameters:
      ticketType - Name of ticket type
      movieType - Type of movie

    • ticketExists

      private boolean ticketExists(ArrayList<Ticket> tickets, String newTicketType, String newMovieType)
      Checks if ticket type already exists
      Parameters:
      tickets - Existing ticket list
      newTicketType - New ticket to be added
      newMovieType - Type of movie (3D / not 3D)
      Returns:
      true if ticket type already exists, else false

    • get2DMovies

      public ArrayList<Ticket> get2DMovies()
      Method to return all base 2D tickets
      Returns:
      ArrayList of 2D tickets

    • get3DMovies

      public ArrayList<Ticket> get3DMovies()
      Method to return all base 3D tickets
      Returns:
      ArrayList of 3D tickets

    • printAllTickets

      public void printAllTickets()
      Method to print all tickets and their prices

    • editTicket

      public void editTicket(String ticketTypeChoice, boolean three_D)
      Method to edit ticket price
      Parameters:
      ticketTypeChoice - Ticket type chosen
      three_D - Boolean to check if ticket type is 3D or not Data written directly to databse

    • chooseTicketType

      public ArrayList<Ticket> chooseTicketType(Showtime showtime, ArrayList<Ticket> tickets)
      Method to choose ticket types for each ticket in an ArrayList of tickets ArrayList is created when customer is booking seats
      Parameters:
      showtime - Showtime to get date
      tickets - ArrayList of tickets without ticket types set
      Returns:
      ArrayList of tickets with types set

    • isWeekend

      public static boolean isWeekend(LocalDateTime ld)
      Method to check if date inputted is a weekend
      Parameters:
      ld - inputted date
      Returns:
      true if date inputted is a weekend, else false
